meanings.definition: A television drama series that is broadcast daily or several times a week.
meanings.sent1: I love watching the soapie with my mom every evening.
meanings.sent2: The soapie I watch always leaves me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent3: The characters in the soapie make me laugh with their silly antics.
meanings.sent4: The soapie is like a window into a different world full of drama and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The soapie has become a daily ritual for many viewers, eagerly awaiting each new episode.

meanings.definition: A bar or cake of soap.
meanings.sent1: Can you pass me the soapie so I can wash my hands?
meanings.sent2: I prefer using a soapie rather than liquid soap in the shower.
meanings.sent3: The soapie slipped out of my hands and landed in the bathtub with a splash.
meanings.sent4: She held the soapie in her palm, its fresh scent filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The soapie lathered up nicely, leaving a clean feeling on my skin.
